verses.verse: Then <S%G5119><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to Jesus <S%G2424><s%> scribes <S%G1122><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%>, which were of <S%G575><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>,

Why <S%G1302><s%> do thy <S%G4675><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> transgress <S%G3845><s%> the tradition <S%G3862><s%> of the elders <S%G4245><s%>? for <S%G1063><s%> they wash <S%G3538><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> their <S%G846><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> they eat <S%G2068><s%> bread <S%G740><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> he answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Why <S%G1302><s%> do ye <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> transgress <S%G3845><s%> the commandment <S%G1785><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> tradition <S%G3862><s%> ?

For <S%G1063><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> commanded <S%G1781><s%> , saying <S%G3004><s%> , Honour <S%G5091><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%> : and <S%G2532><s%> , He that curseth <S%G2551><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%> , let him die <S%G5053><s%> the death <S%G2288><s%> .

But <S%G1161><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> , Whosoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> shall say <S%G2036><s%> to his father <S%G3962><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> his mother <S%G3384><s%> , It is a gift <S%G1435><s%> , by <S%G1537><s%> whatsoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> thou mightest be profited <S%G5623><s%> by me <S%G1700><s%> ;

And <S%G2532><s%> honour <S%G5091><s%> not <S%G3364><s%> his <S%G846><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%> , he shall be free . Thus <S%G2532><s%> have ye made <S%G208><s%> the commandment <S%G1785><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> of none effect <S%G208><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> tradition <S%G3862><s%> .
Ye hypocrites <S%G5273><s%> , well <S%G2573><s%> did <S%G4395><s%> Esaias <S%G2268><s%> prophesy <S%G4395><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> , saying <S%G3004><s%> ,

This <S%G3778><s%> people <S%G2992><s%> draweth nigh <S%G1448><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%> with their <S%G846><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> honoureth <S%G5091><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> with their lips <S%G5491><s%> ; but <S%G1161><s%> their <S%G846><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> is <S%G568><s%> far <S%G4206><s%> from <S%G575><s%> me <S%G1700><s%> .
But <S%G1161><s%> in vain <S%G3155><s%> they do worship <S%G4576><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> , teaching <S%G1321><s%> for doctrines <S%G1319><s%> the commandments <S%G1778><s%> of men <S%G444><s%> .
¶ And <S%G2532><s%> he called <S%G4341><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%>, and said <S%G2036><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Hear <S%G191><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> understand <S%G4920><s%> :

Not <S%G3756><s%> that which goeth <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the mouth <S%G4750><s%> defileth <S%G2840><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> ; but <S%G235><s%> that which cometh <S%G1607><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the mouth <S%G4750><s%> , this <S%G5124><s%> defileth <S%G2840><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> .

Then <S%G5119><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%>, and said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Knowest thou <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> were offended <S%G4624><s%>, after they heard <S%G191><s%> this saying <S%G3056><s%>?

But <S%G1161><s%> he answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%>, Every <S%G3956><s%> plant <S%G5451><s%> , which <S%G3739><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> heavenly <S%G3770><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> hath <S%G5452><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> planted <S%G5452><s%> , shall be rooted up <S%G1610><s%> .

Let <S%G863><s%> them <S%G846><s%> alone <S%G863><s%> : they be <S%G1526><s%> blind <S%G5185><s%> leaders <S%G3595><s%> of the blind <S%G5185><s%> . And <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> the blind <S%G5185><s%> lead <S%G3594><s%> the blind <S%G5185><s%> , both <S%G297><s%> shall fall <S%G4098><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the ditch <S%G999><s%> .
Then <S%G1161><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Declare <S%G5419><s%> unto us <S%G2254><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> parable <S%G3850><s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%>, Are <S%G2075><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> yet <S%G188><s%> without understanding <S%G801><s%> ?

Do <S%G3539><s%> not <S%G3768><s%> ye <S%G3539><s%> yet <S%G3768><s%> understand <S%G3539><s%> , that <S%G3754><s%> whatsoever <S%G3956><s%> entereth in <S%G1531><s%> at <S%G1519><s%> the mouth <S%G4750><s%> goeth <S%G5562><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the belly <S%G2836><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> is cast out <S%G1544><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the draught <S%G856><s%> ?

But <S%G1161><s%> those things which <S%G3588><s%> proceed <S%G1607><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the mouth <S%G4750><s%> come forth <S%G1831><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the heart <S%G2588><s%> ; and they <S%G2548><s%> defile <S%G2840><s%> the man <S%G444><s%> .

For <S%G1063><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the heart <S%G2588><s%> proceed <S%G1831><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%> thoughts <S%G1261><s%> , murders <S%G5408><s%> , adulteries <S%G3430><s%> , fornications <S%G4202><s%> , thefts <S%G2829><s%> , false witness <S%G5577><s%> , blasphemies <S%G988><s%> :

These <S%G5023><s%> are <S%G2076><s%> the things which <S%G3588><s%> defile <S%G2840><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> : but <S%G1161><s%> to eat <S%G5315><s%> with unwashen <S%G449><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%> defileth <S%G2840><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> .

¶ Then <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> thence <S%G1564><s%>, and departed <S%G402><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the coasts <S%G3313><s%> of Tyre <S%G5184><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Sidon <S%G4605><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%>, behold <S%G2400><s%>, a woman <S%G1135><s%> of Canaan <S%G5478><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> out of <S%G575><s%> the same <S%G1565><s%> coasts <S%G3725><s%>, and cried <S%G2905><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Have mercy <S%G1653><s%> on me <S%G3165><s%>, O Lord <S%G2962><s%>, thou Son <S%G5207><s%> of David <S%G1138><s%>; my <S%G3450><s%> daughter <S%G2364><s%> is grievously <S%G2560><s%> vexed with a devil <S%G1139><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> he answered <S%G611><s%> her <S%G846><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> a word <S%G3056><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> and besought <S%G2065><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Send <S%G630><s%> her <S%G846><s%> away <S%G630><s%>; for <S%G3754><s%> she crieth <S%G2896><s%> after <S%G3693><s%> us <S%G2257><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> he answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%>, I am <S%G649><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> but <S%G1508><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the lost <S%G622><s%> sheep <S%G4263><s%> of the house <S%G3624><s%> of Israel <S%G2474><s%> .
Then <S%G1161><s%> came she <S%G2064><s%> and worshipped <S%G4352><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Lord <S%G2962><s%>, help <S%G997><s%> me <S%G3427><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> he answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%>, It is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> meet <S%G2570><s%> to take <S%G2983><s%> the children's <S%G5043><s%> bread <S%G740><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> to cast <S%G906><s%> it to dogs <S%G2952><s%> .

And <S%G1161><s%> she said <S%G2036><s%>, Truth <S%G3483><s%>, Lord <S%G2962><s%>: yet <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1063><s%> the dogs <S%G2952><s%> eat <S%G2068><s%> of <S%G575><s%> the crumbs <S%G5589><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> fall <S%G4098><s%> from <S%G575><s%> their <S%G846><s%> masters' <S%G2962><s%> table <S%G5132><s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> unto her <S%G846><s%>, O <S%G5599><s%> woman <S%G1135><s%> , great <S%G3173><s%> is thy <S%G4675><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> : be it <S%G1096><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%> even as <S%G5613><s%> thou wilt <S%G2309><s%> . And <S%G2532><s%> her <S%G846><s%> daughter <S%G2364><s%> was made whole <S%G2390><s%> from <S%G575><s%> that very <S%G1565><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> departed <S%G3327><s%> from thence <S%G1564><s%>, and came <S%G2064><s%> nigh unto <S%G3844><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%> of Galilee <S%G1056><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> went up <S%G305><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a mountain <S%G3735><s%>, and sat down <S%G2521><s%> there <S%G1563><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> great <S%G4183><s%> multitudes <S%G3793><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, having <S%G2192><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> them those that were <S%G1438><s%> lame <S%G5560><s%>, blind <S%G5185><s%>, dumb <S%G2974><s%>, maimed <S%G2948><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> others <S%G2087><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> cast <S%G4496><s%> them <S%G846><s%> down <S%G4496><s%> at <S%G3844><s%> Jesus' <S%G2424><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he healed <S%G2323><s%> them <S%G846><s%>:

Insomuch that <S%G5620><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> wondered <S%G2296><s%>, when they saw <S%G991><s%> the dumb <S%G2974><s%> to speak <S%G2980><s%>, the maimed <S%G2948><s%> to be whole <S%G5199><s%>, the lame <S%G5560><s%> to walk <S%G4043><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the blind <S%G5185><s%> to see <S%G991><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> they glorified <S%G1392><s%> the God <S%G2316><s%> of Israel <S%G2474><s%>.

¶ Then <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> called <S%G4341><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> unto him, and said <S%G2036><s%>, I have compassion <S%G4697><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> , because <S%G3754><s%> they continue <S%G4357><s%> with me <S%G3427><s%> now <S%G2235><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> nothing <S%G3756><s%> <S%G5101><s%> to eat <S%G5315><s%> : and <S%G2532><s%> I will <S%G2309><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> send <S%G630><s%> them <S%G846><s%> away <S%G630><s%> fasting <S%G3523><s%> , lest <S%G3379><s%> they faint <S%G1590><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the way <S%G3598><s%> .

And <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Whence <S%G4159><s%> should we <S%G2254><s%> have so much <S%G5118><s%> bread <S%G740><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the wilderness <S%G2047><s%>, as <S%G5620><s%> to fill <S%G5526><s%> so great <S%G5118><s%> a multitude <S%G3793><s%>?

And <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, How many <S%G4214><s%> loaves <S%G740><s%> have ye <S%G2192><s%> ? And <S%G1161><s%> they said <S%G2036><s%>, Seven <S%G2033><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> a few <S%G3641><s%> little fishes <S%G2485><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> he commanded <S%G2753><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> to sit down <S%G377><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the ground <S%G1093><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he took <S%G2983><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> loaves <S%G740><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the fishes <S%G2486><s%>, and gave thanks <S%G2168><s%>, and brake <S%G2806><s%> them, and <S%G2532><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> to his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%> to the multitude <S%G3793><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they did <S%G5315><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> eat <S%G5315><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> were filled <S%G5526><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> they took up <S%G142><s%> of the broken <S%G2801><s%> meat that was left <S%G4052><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> baskets <S%G4711><s%> full <S%G4134><s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> they that did eat <S%G2068><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> four thousand <S%G5070><s%> men <S%G435><s%>, beside <S%G5565><s%> women <S%G1135><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> children <S%G3813><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he sent away <S%G630><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%>, and took <S%G1684><s%> ship <S%G1519><s%> <S%G4143><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the coasts <S%G3725><s%> of Magdala <S%G3093><s%>.
